description:
Hiking the Grind one day, running it the next, the Summit Vectiv Pro trail shoe can do it all. A carbon-fibre plate puts some pop in your step and rocker geometry moves you forward along the trail. Plenty of cushion underfoot keeps you going, all day long.

  • Seamless upper combines breathable mesh with a TPU toe cap and heel cup to protect your feet
  • VECTIV™ 2.0 carbon-fibre plate for exceptional stability and energy output on technical terrain
  • Internal heel counter provides a secure fit
  • Tongue wings reduce slippage and enhance the step-in comfort and fit
  • High-rebound, full-length foam midsole
  • Rocker midsole geometry engineered to create long-lasting forward propulsion
  • Surface CTRL™ rubber outsole with 3.5mm lugs optimized for trail running
name: The North Face Summit Vectiv Pro Trail Running Shoes - Men's
